name: My Solutions IT
tag_list: telephony, telecommunications, social-media, internet-marketing, search-engine-optimization, systems-administration, web-application-development, web-application-support, desktop-support, call-center-management, asterisk, freeswitch, business-analysis
overview:
My Solutions IT consultants evaluate companies’ business models along with current and future needs and match those analyses to the best possible technology solutions available.

My Solutions IT does this through extensive business analysis to determine what areas can benefit from technology improvements and where existing technology solutions can be further streamlined and automated.

My Solutions IT can do this by improving/extending your communications infrastructure to integrate various channels such as in-house and public facing instant messaging & chat, office telephone systems with email & SMS integration, intelligent routing call center systems, groupware solutions, web based tools, web sites, social media and SEO/internet marketing.

My Solutions IT can also ease the pain of systems administration and desktop support by using their own experts to manage these services for you.
